item.title: Starmer's aide McSweeney not leaving role over over briefing war, BBC told
item.description: The PM's chief of staff was not involved "directly or indirectly" in briefings against cabinet ministers, sources tell the BBC.

item.title: Royal outrider cleared over pedestrian's death
item.description: Met Police officer PC Christopher Harrison was accused of causing death by careless driving.

item.title: UK's first small nuclear power station to be built in north Wales
item.description: Three small modular reactors are confirmed for the site, with the potential for up to eight.

item.title: Man, 18, arrested on suspicion of murder after 17-year-old girl dies
item.description: A man has been arrested and is in custody following the incident, police said.

item.title: Bellingham set to start on bench against Serbia
item.description: Jude Bellingham is in line to start on the bench for England's World Cup qualifier against Serbia, with Morgan Rogers set to play in the number 10 rol...
